{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ADT |model=iHub |revision=(iHUB-3001B-ADT) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/07/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=home automation controller |fcc_id=S23-IHUB3001B |ic_id=5747A-IHUB3001B |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Z-Wave |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=iHub_XXXXXXXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^iHub_[a-f0-9]{12}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0E:8F,00:C0:02 |oui_eth=00:0E:8F,00:C0:02 |default_ch= }} This device has a FCC grantee code of iControl Networks.
OEM SerComm (YUC00A-1.6), model NA801-B?
The FCC manual says the device has 32MB RAM and 32MB Flash (NOR).
The OUI on the FCC EUT is 00:C0:02 ('''SerComm'''). :Per '''WiGLE''' data, the default SSID of the device seems to be '''iHub_XXXXXXXXXXXX''', where '''XXXXXXXXXXXX''' is the serial number (w/ lower case letters). The S/Ns seem to start with '''006035'''. Additionally, a 00:0E:8F ('''SerComm''') OUI is also used with this pattern - it is presumed to also be used with this device.
